title: Kinda
review: So the film was okay but the main problem was Pennywise was just not scary. So for a horror film tonight the scariest kind of a problem

title: Doh!!!
review: I just spent the whole movie waiting for something to happen, 'it'll get moving anytime now' It just never really happened and I am actually really disappointed. I thought Get out was good I thought it was a bit slow but this movie is just slow period at least get out kind of went somewhere and had a climax and a good finish.
